price: 60.Kay marak abbobtih yan mari, diggah Nuucow nanu Baxxaqqa itta makoh addat koo nable kaak iyye.
arabic: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla al-mala-u min qawmihi innā lanarāka fī ḍalālin mubīnin
